snippet: Philip L. Sherman has been performing the ritual circumcision since 1978, becoming well known among Jews and non-Jews alike.
abstract: Philip L. Sherman has been performing the ritual circumcision since 1978, becoming well known among Jews and non-Jews alike.

headline.main: Bringing Decades of Experience to the Bris
headline.print_headline: 20,000 Circumcisions, and Still a Steady Hand
